title: Buttered ham, English asparagus and parsley
description: Here’s a fabulous spring brunch dish for two. Simple and delicious.
ingredients: 2 x 150g/5½oz pieces of ham, cut into 2½cm/1in thick slices
1 bunch asparagus (about 8-10 spears), woody ends trimmed and peeled
3 small Maris Piper potatoes, cut into very thin strips
vegetable oil for deep fat frying
